title: Milt Buckner - Please Mr Organ Player & Send Me Softly (1957
description:
MILT BUCKNER - PLEASE, MR. ORGAN PLAYER + SEND ME SOFTLY

PLEASE, MR. ORGAN PLAYER

01. Don't Let The Sun Catch You Crying
02. You're Looking Good
03. Gee Baby, Ain't I Good To You
04. Blue Prelude
05. Long Gone
06. Please, Mr. Organ Player
07. Sermonette
08. 'Round Midnight
09. Buck'n The Blues
10. Cry Me A River

Milt Buckner - organ
Jimmy Campbell - alto sax (3, 5, 7, 8 & 10)
Reggie Boyd - guitar
Richard Evans - bass
Maurice Sinclair - drums
Chicago, May 26 & 27, 1960

SEND ME SOFTLY

11. Someone Else's Love
12. All Or Nothing At All
13. You're My Girl
14. Idle Gossip
15. Turquoise
16. When Sunny Gets Blue
17. Easy Come, Easy Go Lover
18. Irresistible You
19. Our Engagement Day
20. Let Me Love You
21. Lullaby Of The Leaves
22. You Are My Love

Milt Buckner - organ
Earle Warren - alto sax
Everett Barksdale - guitar
Osie Johnson - drums
New York, July 24 & 25, 1957

ADDITIONAL BONUS TRACKS

23. Night Mist
24. Good Time Express
25. Dinner Date
26. Second Section

Milt Buckner - organ & piano
Earle Warren - alto sax (23 & 25)
Sam "The Man" Taylor - tenor sax (24 & 26)
Skeeter Best - guitar
Milt Hinton - bass
Osie Johnson - drums
New York, September 19, 1956

27. Hey Now, Zorina!
28. Deep Purple
29. Count's Basement

Milt Buckner - organ & overdubbed piano
Everett Barksdale - guitar
Mickey Baker - guitar
Milt Hinton - bass
Osie Johnson or Shadow Wilson - drums
New York, February 22, 1957

2012 Solar Records
